metadata.title: CVE-2022-34670 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer handler, where an unprivileged regular user can cause truncationerrors when casting a primitive to a primitive of smaller size causes datato be lost in the conversion, which may lead to denial of service orinformation disclosure.
